title: Intensive Short-Term Course for Enhancing Practical Competencies Through Nursing Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and understanding of fundamental clinical skills
context.additional_context: Enhancing adaptability to nursing home field practice through joint simulation training with experienced nurses

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies for responding to real clinical scenarios through debriefing after simulation training.
Learners can accurately perform role distribution with professional nurses in a collaborative simulation environment with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply skills acquired in practical settings at least twice within 48 hours after simulation training.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
